_header: Saint Patrick through God all might
_description: St. Patrick and his Purgatory — in quatrains

BLHar4012.First Lines:
SEnt Patrik thorow god all myghtKam for to preche In
                    Irland…
BLHar4012.Last Lines:
…Hym thoght almost hit had hym slowHe withstode and ganne a
                    litell brayde…
